name: actions_set-github-actions-permissions-repository
description:
Sets the GitHub Actions permissions policy for enabling GitHub Actions and allowed actions and reusable workflows in the repository.

You must authenticate using an access token with the `repo` scope to use this endpoint. GitHub Apps must have the `administration` repository permission to use this API.

owner.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

repo.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

allowed-actions.description: The permissions policy that controls the actions and reusable workflows that are allowed to run.

actions-enabled.description: Whether GitHub Actions is enabled on the repository.
